You are simply a propaganda puppet and just turned this comment into your own dramatic agenda. Obama stunts are his choice, and most people think he sucks as Prez because of """"little things"""" like the freaking Meds he has created here and around the flipping globe! You are even stretching your own BS agenda playing the Bigot card on this one! PS...since you are obviously political and cultural experts, how is Al Sharpton doing? He seems to have slipped out of the media too! The common sense of those who despise Obama is """"astounding"""". The whole freaking world is laughing at this clown. Oh well...Putin has the global scene under control now! HeeHaw.
